name: FastBall
description:
THE ULTIMATE SWING ACTION GAME, 'Spidey Riley', JUST ARRIVED TO APPSTORE, GET IT WHILE IT'S HOT!

In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen.

With this simple mechanic, FastBall contains 60 action packed progressive levels + 3 marathon levels. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end.

It is easy to play and easy to enjoy....
